error: make: *** No rule to make target `hello.c'.  Stop.
solution: You need call 'make hello' instead of 'make hello.c', it is not expecting the c file as argument, instead just the name hello with out the extension .c

error: make: *** No targets specified and no makefile found.  Stop.
solution: Along with make you need to give the argument to compile the C code.e.g: make hello
